main event: Two witnesses observed a round, white object near Heppner, Oregon on March 3, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a half dollar,The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes,The witnesses reported that the object had a slight lateral motion as it moved,The object disappeared in about 10 seconds,It was observed at an elevation of 20 degrees.
witness description: two witnesses who reported the object's movement
